entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
